html:
12.29.20  12:02 am   Is Bill short for anything?

      built

12.28.20  11:48 pm   why can i only make art when im sad?

      you can do it any time, but, maybe when you are sad you are less distracted by so many other things you can do when not sad

12.28.20  11:02 pm   is meaning inherent to things or do people assign meaning to things?

      ah, it looks like you've not yet had the pleasure of ...... assigning inherent meaning

12.28.20  10:01 pm   Bill, I saw a comment on your latest video "I might quit" it said "EVERYONE, HE IS NOT GOING AWAY. HE'S BEEN STUDYING 3D ANIMATION AND IS CURRENTLY WORKING ON A NEW VIDEO AS WE SPEAK. CHECK OUT HIS WEBSITE AS HE ANSWERS QUESTIONS THERE. is this true?

      yes, although an important distinction i have to make is that i will also be doing hundreds more videos and songs after this one, and this first one is not particularly 'large' or 'good'. just make sure i get that clarified

12.28.20  9:32 pm   How is 3D animation going

      it's seems to be both ruining my life and saving it, as predicted

12.28.20  9:31 pm   So apparently "signage" is actually a word. How did I just hear about this

      you've apparently never worked in a retail store

12.28.20  8:44 pm   where do you get your lyrics from? they are very random and awesome and make me feel good so i want to know please so i can also make lyrics like that plz :P

      they're not supposed to be random, but, the main way i do it is i do it musically. so instead of just imagining words, i'm imagining words being sung. Actually the first step is really to imagine *worlds*, then imagine words being sung about those worlds

12.28.20  7:42 pm   what genres of music do you like?

      good, bad,

12.28.20  7:41 pm   What if instead of doing infinity you made a computer do it?

      computers can't do infinity............. yet

12.28.20  7:25 pm   do you need to be so serious?

      apparently yes

12.28.20  4:41 pm   This isn't a question but, I wanna say whenever I'm down I just watch one of you videos, Even a  MILISECOND is enough, and then I can go about 5 months without being a mood. Thank you for brightening up my day, I hope this comment did the same for you!! Btw on your song (what is love?) The end was so satisfying, somebody noticed that "HELL YEAH" Are also four letter words!!

      holy smokes you are very friendly

12.28.20  3:55 pm   Why is your music so wonderful?

      to make up for all the times it's terrible

12.28.20  2:21 pm   What day of the week will your next video release? 

      knowing me, it will almost definitely certainly be a Tuesday

12.28.20  1:37 pm   Bill I would really be interested on your thoughts on global warming

      the key to global warming is remembering to also cool the globe at some point

12.28.20  1:17 pm   Why does belgium exist?

      you demanded for it

12.28.20  11:43 am   Why are you the coolest music guy ever?

      this could be due to normalness and the high amount of normalcy i posess

12.28.20  11:39 am   which religion is correct?

      yours, so you better make it good

12.28.20  10:24 am   what's your favorite shape?

      /// angular |||

12.28.20  9:01 am   How is 3d modeling going,

     i'm not really doing it. i've found one of the keys to the game at this point is mostly not doing that

     also have a fake baguette

12.28.20  7:43 am   Have you ever considered having a dig at the government in one of your songs or have you already?

      i've done that but then i've realized it's not very polite

12.28.20  7:26 am   Hey Bill, I recall you saying you don't really like the concept of albums. From a listeners point of view, I get it. But I guess it makes sense for an artist to bundle a bunch of different executions of some musical ideas together.

     is it just songs? or is it more than just songs? if it's just songs, i call it songs, and if it's more than just songs then i wouldn't call it an album. Unless we are talking about pictures, if you have a group of pictures then i do call that an album

      Do you categorize your own stuff in any way before, during or after working on it?

     yes, some categories i have are song, not song, fiction, non fiction, etc

12.28.20  7:14 am   Why is life so granular?

      that's cause of all these fuckin.... grains it has

12.28.20  6:53 am   how to be a good person?

      everyone is good. the hard part is proving it

12.28.20  5:58 am   do you hate capital letters

      no

12.28.20  5:57 am   If a chord will describe your life, what chord is it?

      the only way to describe life with chords is to change the chords sometimes

12.28.20  5:55 am   when did you give up on albums and realise that you prefer individual songs?

      i've given up on albums several times, but the good news is there's another important thing called more than an album

12.28.20  3:40 am   What is a Joke ?

      sort of like a trick

12.28.20  2:37 am   aren't we all really just big narcissistic monkeys

      no

12.28.20  1:50 am   Are we all influenced by our surroundings via inspiration and queues?  

     sure

     If so, is that influence so strong to garuntee a course of action from every being with a spirit, ensuring that nobody truly has free will, leading to our lives and the lives of everyone to follow to be predetermined?

     not even close

12.28.20  1:40 am   Where do you get inspiration from for your work, either past or currently developing

      walk down the road ..... it's in the road

12.28.20  1:07 am   I have to write a jazz tune for school. How do I come up with a melody? I already have an idea for the chord changes. 

      you may have locked yourself into a corner here, by coming up with chords first. But if you already have the chords, you could just put 1 melody note per chord and that should be fine

12.28.20  12:56 am   bill, today I discovered that inspiration can come both from when i'm out and about or when my nose is to the grindstone. And sometimes it never comes at all! when do you get your inspiration?

      any time

12.27.20  11:59 pm   Will you be making more videos?

      yes

12.27.20  11:43 pm   how's your new video?

      it's ok

12.27.20  11:22 pm   Can you make this "Project" fast as you can? This is a bad year and we literally need you.

      you might be misinterpreting what i'm working on. i am working on making videos, so if i ever finished that project, that would mean i would be done making videos. which hopefully won't happen any time soon

12.27.20  10:38 pm   You said something about 3D animation ruining your life, I'm curious about how that is? I can only guess why. It keeps me wondering.

     it's kind of like when you thought you could eat a horse, so you try to eat the horse

      Another question, does your brain begin to think of other things to do and ideas while you work and whatever your working on gets transformed into that?

     somewhat

      Or just me?

12.27.20  9:00 pm   hi im a sheep

      fair enough

12.27.20  7:33 pm   How long do you think it will take to finish studying 3d animation stuff?

      you could spend 1000 lifetimes and never finish

12.27.20  8:31 pm   (Knock knock)

Who's there?

      it's you

12.27.20  7:28 pm   why do you think nihilism is fake?

      typically when someone says 'nihilism' i have to go look it up, and it usually says something like 'meaninglessness' or something related to meaninglessness. Well, meaninglessness is fake, in my opinion

12.27.20  7:01 pm   Bill, will there ever come a time where there can be no "new" art?

      no

12.27.20  6:22 pm   What is music?

      the secret of the universe. you would think that's great news, because that means we could figure out the secret of the universe by understanding music. but that only raises more questions

12.27.20  6:15 pm   why did you stop making Monday videos?

      to focus more on......... Tuesday videos

12.27.20  6:10 pm   what inspired you to make music

      must have been music itself

12.27.20  5:36 pm   will u make a song about potatoes soon

      it's more likely that i will make a lot of non-potato songs

12.27.20  4:02 pm   What is your favourite video that you've uploaded

      i would prefer to upload a new one to be my favorite

12.27.20  3:44 pm   What inspires you?

      time and space

12.27.20  3:00 pm   Can I hear some of your new music ?

      sure

12.27.20  2:32 pm   if i were to choreograph to one of your songs how would you react

      that depends on how you choreographed it. it's like a picture: you can't see the picture until you .............. see the picture

12.27.20  2:31 pm   why are u so cool

      i work in the government department, of the government
